General.Name: Fiducial Office Solutions
General.Description: Fiducial Office Solutions distributes office supplies and furniture products in France. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Courbevoie, France. Fiducial Office Solutions operates as a subsidiary of Fiducial Sofiral.
General.Address: 41 Rue Du Capitaine Guynemer, Courbevoie, France, 92400

1.Name: Mr. Bertrand  Cote
1.Title: Head of Investor Relations, Head of Shareholder Relations & Director
